name: Monsters' Tackles
description:
UPDATE!

we have added some changes in the game! we encourage you to try this version!

Run and evade the enemies before it's too late!
avoid getting touched, moving around the map to survive, if the player losses all their lifes they will be turned into one of them!Not only the 3 monsters are your enemies, some obstacles will try their best to stop you from your mission

Controls
  • arrow keys - Move  
  • Space bar - jump       
Team
  •  Jazmin Luna 
  • Elizabeth Guerrero 
  • Jesús Ferniz 
  • Luis Valdez
